lead_paragraph: KNAPP--Herbert A.,M.D., 91, died June 13, 2016. Graduate of Colgate University, New York University Medical School. Life Celebration at home in Orford, NH, July 10, 2016. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KNAPP, HERBERT A.
